trans-unit.source: Specifies caching behavior for resources obtained using <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> and its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebRequest" /> 及其衍生類別取得之資源的快取行為。

trans-unit.source: Members of this enumeration are used to initialize <xref:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉的成員用來初始化<xref:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy>物件。

trans-unit.source: The current setting for a <xref:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy> object is available in the <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy.Level%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 目前的設定<xref:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy>物件位於<xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCachePolicy.Level%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel.BypassCache> value is the default cache behavior specified in the machine configuration file that ships with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel.BypassCache>值是隨附於.NET Framework 的電腦組態檔中指定的預設快取行為。

trans-unit.source: No entries are taken from caches, added to caches, or removed from caches between the client and server.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端與伺服器之間沒有任何項目取得自快取、加入快取或從快取移除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is used to get or set the default cache policy for <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.DefaultCachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性用來取得或設定的預設快取原則<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is used to get or set the default cache policy for a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性用來取得或設定的預設快取原則<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is used to get or set the cache policy for a specific request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性用來取得或設定特定要求的快取原則。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則資源的複本只會加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: So another request for the same resource could use a cached copy, depending on the default cache policy level for this request.
trans-unit.target: 讓另一個要求相同的資源無法使用快取的副本，根據此要求的預設快取原則層級。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates policy that returns a resource only if it is in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立快取中才會傳回資源的原則。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies a request by using the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用伺服器滿足要求。

trans-unit.source: No entries are taken from caches, added to caches, or removed from caches between the client and server.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端與伺服器之間沒有任何項目取得自快取、加入快取或從快取移除。

trans-unit.source: This is the default cache behavior specified in the machine configuration file that ships with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 這是電腦組態檔 (隨 .NET Framework 一起提供) 中指定的預設快取行為。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies a request for a resource from the cache, if the resource is available; otherwise, sends a request for a resource to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源可用，則從快取滿足資源要求，否則會將資源要求傳送至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If the requested item is available in any cache between the client and the server, the request might be satisfied by the intermediate cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端與伺服器之間的任何快取中存在要求的項目，則中繼快取可以滿足該要求。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a requested resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則要求資源的複本只會加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: So subsequent requests for the same resource would use a cached copy.
trans-unit.target: 讓相同資源的後續要求會使用快取的副本。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies a request using the locally cached resource; does not send a request for an item that is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 使用本機快取的資源滿足要求；不傳送未在快取中的項目要求。

trans-unit.source: When this cache policy level is specified, a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> exception is thrown if the item is not in the client cache.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個快取原則層級時，如果項目不在用戶端快取中，則會擲回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebException" /> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies a request for a resource either by using the cached copy of the resource or by sending a request for the resource to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用資源的快取複本，或將資源要求傳送至伺服器，以滿足資源要求。

trans-unit.source: The action taken is determined by the current cache policy and the age of the content in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 採取的動作要由目前的快取原則和快取中內容的保留期限決定。

trans-unit.source: This is the cache level that should be used by most applications.
trans-unit.target: 這是大部分應用程式應當使用的快取層級。

trans-unit.source: Never satisfies a request by using resources from the cache and does not cache resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用快取中的資源永遠無法滿足要求，也不會快取資源。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is present in the local cache, it is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源出現在本機快取中，則會將其移除。

trans-unit.source: This policy level indicates to intermediate caches that they should remove the resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個原則層級表示中繼快取應當移除資源。

trans-unit.source: In the HTTP caching protocol, this is achieved using the <see langword="no-cache" /> cache control directive.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTTP 快取通訊協定中，可以使用 <see langword="no-cache" /> 快取控制項指示詞達到此效果。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies a request by using the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用伺服器滿足要求。

trans-unit.source: The response might be saved in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 回應可以儲存在快取中。

trans-unit.source: In the HTTP caching protocol, this is achieved using the <see langword="no-cache" /> cache control directive and the no-cache <see langword="Pragma" /> header.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTTP 快取通訊協定中，可以使用 <see langword="no-cache" /> 快取控制項指示詞和 no-cache <see langword="Pragma" /> 標頭達到此效果。

trans-unit.source: Satisfies a request by using the cached copy of the resource if the timestamp is the same as the timestamp of the resource on the server; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server, presented to the caller, and stored in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果時間戳記與伺服器上資源的時間戳記相同，則使用資源的快取複本滿足要求，否則，會從伺服器下載該資源，將其呈現給呼叫端，並儲存在快取中。

trans-unit.source: A copy of a resource is only added to the cache if the response stream for the resource is retrieved and read to the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源的回應資料流擷取和讀取資料流末端，則資源的複本只會加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: So subsequent requests for the same resource would use a cached copy if the timestamp for the cached resource is the same as the timestamp of the resource on the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果快取資源的時間戳記是與伺服器上資源的時間戳記相同，因此後續要求相同的資源會使用快取的副本。
